### Winter Nursery Services at the Brandon Research & Development Centre

#### Tender Reference Number

* CB-7427-73738815 (English)
* Numéro de réference : CB-7427-73738815 (French)

#### Tender Notice

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites interested suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities (SOC) for the provision of Winter Nursery Services at the Brandon Research and Development Centre (BRDC), Brandon, Manitoba.

#### Background

AAFC is seeking a Contractor specializing in disease pressure and small plot work to provide winter nursery services for barley breeding material. The successful Contractor will be required to plant barley seeds provided by BRDC, manage and harvest rows/plots, and provide a phytosanitary certificate to meet the import permit requirements.

#### Requirements

* Plant barley seeds provided by BRDC
* Manage and harvest rows/plots
* Obtain a phytosanitary certificate for import purposes
* Export harvested seed and ears to BRDC

#### Evaluation Criteria

The SOC must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the requirements specified above.

#### Standing Offer Period

* Contract Period: September 1, 2023 to April 30, 2024
* Option Years: Four (4) one-year option periods

#### Estimated Contract Value

* Initial Contract Period: $32,380.00 CAD (plus applicable taxes)
* Option Years: $32,380.00 CAD each (plus applicable taxes)

#### Pre-identified Supplier

* Second Nature Research LLC, Yuma, Arizona, USA

#### Sole-Source Justification

Second Nature Research, LLC is the only supplier able to meet the requirements specified above. The Contracting Authority is invoking the Government Contracts Regulations Exception and Limited Tendering Reason due to the absence of competition for technical reasons.

#### Response Instructions

Suppliers interested in providing Winter Nursery Services must submit a SOC to Natalie O'Neill, Contracting Specialist, Western Service Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, by August 4, 2023, at 2:00 pm CST. The SOC must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the requirements specified above.

#### Contact Information

* Natalie O'Neill, Contracting Specialist, Western Service Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada: natalie.oneill@agr.gc.ca / Cell: 306-807-8740
